New Records: LeBron James had his fourth consecutive triple-double, a first in his 22-year NBA career.
Key Match Events: LeBron James recorded a triple-double with 15 points, 16 rebounds, and 12 assists in the Lakers' 120-115 win over the Spurs.
LeBron James credited his teammates for their shooting, which enabled his assists.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's composure and ability to make timely stops and plays.
LeBron James acknowledged his reduced offensive role but emphasized his continued impact on the game.
LeBron James shared a moment with Spurs rookie Stephon Castle, offering advice and encouragement.
